name: Gurpreet Singh
title: Lead Instructor & Founder
sectionTitle: Learn from One of India's Best
paragraphs: Gurpreet is one of India's most accomplished paragliding competition pilots, with over three decades of flying experience since 1993.
As a BHPA-certified paragliding instructor, Flying since 1993 and competing internationally since 2002. likely the only one in India certified by a globally accredited body.
With multiple podium finishes in India and Europe, his competition experience translates into real-world skills and techniques that he passes on to every student.
